text: Monopyle is a genus of plants in the family Gesneriaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Monopyle ecuadorensis, C.V.Morton * Monopyle paniculata, Benth. * Monopyle sodiroana, Fritsch * Monopyle stenoloba, C.V.Morton Category:Gesneriaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Monopyle
